page.title: 07Redevelopment of Splott 2.
page.content: 1.{Commercial.}Small scale development {only}considered within community areas of:Clifton Street,Broadway,Splott Road,Carlisle Street.Preferred location of hotel and guest house sites for this area on south side of Newport Road. {2.Social and Recreation}:Assistance given for use of suitable buildings and sites for proven social needs.For areas of deficient open space consideration given for suitable site to be used for additional public open space and children's play area. {3Environment.}Cardiff City Council carry out measures to secure improvement of unsightly land and buildings.Landscaping of all new developments in Splott including highways.Environmental enhancement schemes for major road and rail corridors.
